name: Half-Giant Thug
text: In the city-states, some enslaved goliaths work as enforcers, and the other residents know better than to say no when half-giant thugs come looking for goods or money. The physical might of these thugs ensures that they receive better treatment than most slaves do, and sometimes their children are set free (to appease the parent and guarantee loyalty).

features.giganticAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, either you can increase your melee reach by 1 for any attack you make with the extra action, or you can regain the use of stone’s endurance
features.half-giant'sRetaliation(11thLevel): When an enemy hits you while you have resistance to that attack because of your stone’s endurance racial power, that enemy grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn
features.urbanSkills(11thLevel): You gain a +2 racial bonus to Intimidate and Streetwise
features.untouchableAthlete(16thLevel): You gain a +5 bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks while jumping 4 or more squares or while climbing

flavorText: Oh, did I get in your way? This alley is too narrow for my bulk. I guess you have to go through me to get where you’re headed.
